name: RObo (mobilex1122)
description:
In this game you are greeted with robot in maze/challenge and lot of files in your game folder, your goal is to navigate the robot to end using your preferred programming language for example python or c++.

Don't worry you don't need some super hard coding to emulate key presses you are just processing data. 

You have endless possibilities how you can play this game. You can create controler and control game using keyboard or you can make ai that will do it automatically.

Warning: Game is in early prototype with just basic controls and graphics.

Features that are or will be in game:

  • Ability to use own programming language to control the game
  • Data error check (w.i.p)
  • Documentation for all data files (w.i.p)
  • Custom language for easy use (w.i.p, will be separate app)
